question: You share a parking area with several neighbours and have recently started having problems.Write a letter to be copied to all neighbours that share the parking area. In that letter• explaining the problems• suggesting ways to help the situation• proposing a possible meetingYou do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear Neighbours,........You should write at least 150 words.
text: I hope that everyone is going well in this pandemic. I am writing this letter to inform all about the difficulty of parking spaces in a parking lodge.

I have realised that there were so many cars which found an improper way to park and some of in the wrong spot. Although this is a threatening issue when we are leaving home for work in hustle times. Though having such type of matter can be created incidents in society.

I would like you to suggest that we should need to think about and, overcome this problem by discussing this. In fact, it will help the children who are actually playing in the lobby in their leisure time.
I would like to propose all society members organise a possible meeting for this matter. I can hope that you will manage your personal time to attend this conference for better solutions.
I look forward to seeing you soon.
